DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized study evaluating use of a powered bone marrow biopsy and aspiration system (OnControl by Vidacare) compared to traditional manual devices. The hypothesis is that the powered system will reduce the level of patient pain during the aspiration and core biopsy procedures and the amount of time needed to perform the procedures.
DOC.brief_title: Powered Bone Marrow Aspiration and Core Biopsy System Compared to Manual Devices
DOC.criteria: Adults over the age of 18 Patients that require core biopsy alone, or core biopsy and bone marrow aspiration Imprisoned Pregnant Cognitively impaired Requiring english language translation other than Spanish Patients with one or more conditions precluding bone marrow core biopsy
DOC.keyword: Bone marrow biopsy of iliac crest
